January 19, 2025 - BayView Entertainment is an American independent film production and distribution company based out of Pompton Plains, New Jersey. In 2015, BayView distributed One Deadly Summer (1983) on physical media. BayView produced the film Skinamarink (2023), which was acquired by Shudder.
